snippets.name: /etc/passwd priv_esc
snippets.description: Configuration that makes the file /etc/passwd editable

snippets.name: ld_preload priv_esc
snippets.code:
RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN echo 'user1 ALL=(root) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/find' | sudo EDITOR='tee -a' visudo

RUN echo 'Defaults env_keep += LD_PRELOAD' | sudo EDITOR='tee -a' visudo
snippets.description: Dockerfile configuration for ld_preload privilege escalation

categories.name: privilege_escalation
categories.description: Code snippets for docker containers privilege escalation misconfigurations
